name: Tricky Word Puzzles Online Trivia | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: This one is in the 'oldie but goodie' category. Fill in the blank... YYUR,YYUB. ICURYY4
questions.explanation:
me.

	Too wise you are, too wise you be. I see you are too wise for...

questions.text: What word in the English language changes its pronunciation when capitalized?
She was a 'nice silky woman', and her seducer may have said ' Wacky loins? Mine?' Who is described by these anagrams?
questions.explanation:
Monica Lewinsky & Monica Lewinski.

	The phrases in quotes are anagrams of 'Monica Lewinsky'

questions.text: You have 4 black socks and 5 brown socks in a drawer. If you need a matching pair- either black or brown-, what is the maximum number of socks you will have to remove to ensure getting one?
questions.explanation:
3 & 3 socks & three & three socks.

	The third sock has to match one of the socks you have already taken. For example, you could get a black and a brown sock with picks one and two- pick three will be either black or brown and thus match either one or two.

questions.text: There are 12 1 cent stamps in a dozen. How many 2-cent stamps are in a dozen?
questions.explanation:
12 & Twelve & 12 stamps & Twelve stamps.

	There are 12 *anything* in a dozen...

questions.text: What word, when you add two letters to it, becomes smaller?
If today is Monday, what is the day after the day before the day before tomorrow?
What is the last word in this famous phrase? 'A man, a plan, a canal...'?
questions.explanation:
Panama.

	This phrase is a palindrome (it reads the same forwards and backwards!)

questions.text: Another anagram! What evil person's name, when anagrammed, becomes 'Hated for ill'?
Whew, almost done! Does your brain hurt yet? How about an analogy for our last question- and even a multiple-choice question at that! Loops is to spool as straw is to...
questions.explanation:
warts.

	Loops is spool spelled backwards, and warts is straw spelled backwards.
